channel.title: Thoughts on Bas-Man's Ponderings
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Bas-Man's Ponderings

item.title: Site Launch.
item.description: Well. Finally got around to putting this site together. Actually this is attempt number two. I will try to post some of my small personal projects and thoughts here. I will also probably create a cheat sheet for myself. Anyway, I shall see how it goes.
